newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Banco Santiago cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Banco Santiago cut.

text.p: -- ING Barings said it had cut its rating for Chile's Banco Santiago to sell from hold.

-- "Following the strong rally of the stock, which has outperformed the market by 15 percent, we are changing our recommendation on the stock to sell from hold," ING Barings wrote in a March 12 report.

-- "... The stock is not only expensive but is also trading into uncharted territory. Our concerns are further enhanced by the fact that the bank will be going through a complex transitional period until the merger between (Banco) O'Higgins and Santiago is fully completed, a process that is always difficult and full of surprises."
